summary: Once upon a time the beautiful Rhineland was swamped in wars and battles. Many legends came and went and yet evil always triumphed. Since then, people have been hoping for a miracle, for a Savior who will rescue them from the dark bondage.
cast: Tom Gerhardt|Dorkas Kiefer|Volker Büdts|Axel Neumann|Jan Sosniok|Daniela Wutte|Michael Brandner|Mirco Nontschew|Markus Maria Profitlich|Diana Frank|Janine Kunze|Mirja Boes|Maximilian Belle|Otto Waalkes|Atze Schröder|Elmar Wepper|Simon Solberg|Martin Gebhardt|Joachim Regelien|Sven Unterwaldt Jr.|Tatiana Pauhofová|Rast O. Petrisko|Martin Uhorcik|Richard Pertis|Patrik Pertis|Matt Brady|Oliver Frandel|Pavol Brensky|Lubomír Kratochvíl|Jozef Cmilansky|Libor Olsan|Detlev Redinger|Stano Flak|Daniel Carlisle
title: Siegfried
